name: AppruveiOSSDK
summary: A Swift client for the Appruve API and a collection of UI elements to capture document photos and take Selfie
description:
This library aims to help mobile apps developers integrating with the Appruve API
by providing a Swift wrapper to the API and a collection of UI screens and elements to capture
photos of documents and faces for further facial recognition.
